item.title: Mandatory volunteering - Sample
item.description: Some people believe that teenagers should be required to do unpaid community work in their free time. This can benefit teenagers and the community as well. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

item.title: Comments on teachers - Sample
item.description: Some people believe that in order to improve educational quality, we should encourage students to make comments or even criticism on their teachers, but others think it will lead to the loss of respect and discipline in the classroom. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

item.title: Harmful effects of tourism - Sample
item.description: Many countries believe that international tourism has harmful effects. Why do they think so? What can be done to change their views?

item.title: Should students study a wide range of subjects?
item.description: In some countries, secondary schools aim to provide a general education across a range of subjects. In others, children focus on a narrow range of subjects related to a particular career. Which do you think is appropriate in today’s world? (Education)

item.title: Lack of recycling and solutions - Sample
item.description: In some countries, there is not enough recycling of waste materials (e.g. paper, glass and cans). What are the reasons and solutions? (Environment)

item.title: Adults living with parents - Sample
item.description: In some countries, more and more adults choose to continue to live with their parents after they graduate and have found jobs. Do the advantages of this trend outweigh its disadvantages?

item.title: P.E.E.L. Writing Method
item.description: Phương pháp viết essay đơn giản, hiệu quả.

item.title: Phones and computers' effect on reading and writing skills - Sample
item.description: Some people think that using mobile phones and computers has a negative effect on young people's reading and writing skills. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

item.title: Promoting sports and art - Sample
item.description: The government should spend money in promoting sport and art in school, rather than sponsoring professional sports and art events in communities. To what extent do you agree or disagree? (Government)

item.title: Books vs TV - Sample
item.description: Some people think reading stories in books is better than watching TV or playing computer games for children. To what extent do you agree or disagree? (Education)

item.title: Games pros and cons - Sample
item.description: Some people say that playing computer games is bad for children in every aspect. Others say that playing computer games can have positive effects on the way children develop. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

item.title: Obsidian + Storj S3
item.description: Sử dụng Storj S3 để sao lưu và đồng bộ hóa các flashcards và notes của bạn trong Obsidian.

item.title: Obsidian flashcards
item.description: Sử dụng ObsidianMD để tạo flash cards.

item.title: Vocabulary
item.description: Làm cách nào để học từ vựng một cách hiệu quả nhất?

item.title: Adverbs and conjunctions for academic writing
item.description: Useful and/or advanced adverbs and conjunctions for academic writing style.

item.title: Tenses
item.description: Giải thích chung về các thì trong tiếng Anh.

item.title: Where to start
item.description: Bạn không biết nên học tiếng Anh từ đâu?
